title: BMMJ17
description: This alarm occurs when machine is started and sealing station top plate dose not activate. Sealing station top plate may not ativate if it is obstructed by side lock cylinder or the top plate cylinder failed to work or if the top reed switch position is disturbed or not functioning. Reason & Remedy
reasons_remedies: Sealing station failed to activate after machine start.
Check if the sealing side lock cylinder is not blocking top plate from activating.
Sealing station top plate activated reed switch not sensing the piston.
Check and adjust the position of reed switch 2.
Check if reed switch is tightned properly and not moving while machine is running.
Check if reed switch is working properly by moving it up and down on clyinder. If reed switch is not functing check the wiring for any loose connection or replace the seed switch.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMJ17
Error Code 17
Category: BMMJ
Title: BMMJ17
Alarm Message: Sealing Top lock SW2 Fail
Description: This alarm occurs when machine is started and sealing station top plate dose not activate. Sealing station top plate may not ativate if it is obstructed by side lock cylinder or the top plate cylinder failed to work or if the top reed switch position is disturbed or not functioning. Reason & Remedy
Reason & Remedy:
1. Sealing station failed to activate after machine start.
2. Check if the sealing side lock cylinder is not blocking top plate from activating.
3. Sealing station top plate activated reed switch not sensing the piston.
4. Check and adjust the position of reed switch 2.
5. Check if reed switch is tightned properly and not moving while machine is running.
6. Reed switch not sensing.
7. Check if reed switch is working properly by moving it up and down on clyinder. If reed switch is not functing check the wiring for any loose connection or replace the seed switch.
